titles.title: Reaching Underserved Rural Areas to Lead on Telehealth Act
Reaching Underserved Rural Areas to Lead on Telehealth Act

A bill to remove the limitation on certain amounts for which large non-rural hospitals may be reimbursed under the Healthcare Connect Fund of the Federal Communications Commission, and for other purposes.
Reaching Underserved Rural Areas to Lead on Telehealth Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
